T02TD2301E:229a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2301E:229a-5: 'jig rten pa ni nga rgyal byed //
T02TD2301E:229a-6: da ni don dam 'jug pa'o zhes //
T02TD2301E:229a-7: gos pa med la zhugs pa ni //
T02TD2301E:229a-8: bye ba'i nang nas gcig tsam srid //
T02TD2301E:229a-9: lung dang rig byed rnying pa yis //
T02TD2301E:229a-10: mkhas pa nga rgyal byed pa dag / dpal 'bras smin pa la ni bung ba bzhin //
T02TD2301E:229a-11: des ni phyi rol dag tu 'khor bar byed //
T02TD2301E:229a-12: byang chub sems dang rdul gyis brgyan //
T02TD2301E:229a-13: mi bskyod pa ni gos 'gyur bas //
T02TD2301E:229a-14: padma'i sa bon rang bzhin la //
T02TD2301E:229a-15: dag pa gnyug ma'i lus la mthong //
T02TD2301E:229a-16: nam mkha'i chu dang 'od dpag med kyi 'dam //
T02TD2301E:229a-17: des ni rtsa ba rab tu spangs nas byas //
T02TD2301E:229a-18: aa wa dh'u t'is rtsa ba sdong po byas //
T02TD2301E:229a-19: ham gi yi ge'i rnam par skyes gyur pa //
T02TD2301E:229a-20: ro ma dang ni brkyang ma gnyis kyis ni //
T02TD2301E:229a-21: g-yas dang g-yon phyogs gnyis kyi sdong bur byas //
T02TD2301E:229a-22: padma 'dab ma bzhi dang rtsa ba bzhi //
T02TD2301E:229a-23: bde ba chen po dag ni tshang na gnas //
T02TD2301E:229a-24: ae wam sa bon dag ni blangs nas ni //
T02TD2301E:229a-25: me tog padma bzhin du rgyas par byed //
T02TD2301E:229a-26: bung ba'i gzugs kyis bde chen dpa' bo ni //
T02TD2301E:229a-27: sbrang rtsi dag ni rab tu 'thung bar byed //
T02TD2301E:229a-28: 'byung ba chen po lnga yi sa bon ni //
T02TD2301E:229a-29: blangs nas rdzogs pa dag tu byed par 'gyur //
T02TD2301E:229a-30: sra bar 'gyur ba dag ni sa yin no //
T02TD2301E:229a-31: chu ni rlan pa tsha ba me las skyes //
T02TD2301E:229a-32: yang zhing g-yo ba dag ni rlung yin no //
T02TD2301E:229a-33: nam mkha' bde ba dag ni gang ba'o //
T02TD2301E:229a-34: ma lus lha dang lha min de las skyes //
T02TD2301E:229a-35: rmongs pa 'di dag rnams ni stong pa'o //
T02TD2301E:229a-36: sa dang chu dang me rlung nam mkha' rnams //
T02TD2301E:229a-37: blo yi yul du blangs nas shes par gyis //
T02TD2301E:229a-38: dpa' rlabs med cing mnyam pa gnyug ma'i lus //
T02TD2301E:229a-39: sgrib pa ma lus spangs pa ste //
T02TD2301E:229a-40: dge dang sdig pa gcig kyang med //
T02TD2301E:229a-41: gsal por nag po dag gis gsum //
T02TD2301E:229a-42: phyi rol 'byung ba dag ni spyad byas nas //
T02TD2301E:229a-43: stong dang stong min dag la 'jug par gyis //
T02TD2301E:229a-44: stong dang stong min gnyis kyi dbus su ni //
T02TD2301E:229a-45: kye ho rmongs pa ci yang ma mthong ngam //
T02TD2301E:229a-46: lhan cig skyes pa gcig pu yod //
T02TD2301E:229a-47: nag po bdag gis yongs su shes //
T02TD2301E:229a-48: lung dang bstan bcos mang po bklags pa dang //
T02TD2301E:229b-0: nyan kyang rmongs pa ci yang @229b mi shes so //
T02TD2301E:229b-1: steng du mi rgyu 'og tu mi 'gro zhing //
T02TD2301E:229b-2: gnyis pa spangs pas de ni brtan par gnas //
T02TD2301E:229b-3: nag po na re yid ni gang du mi 'pho zer //
T02TD2301E:229b-4: mi g-yo rlung ni khyim bdag mo ni khyim du gnas //
T02TD2301E:229b-5: mchog gi ri bo dag ni phug zab mor //
T02TD2301E:229b-6: 'gro ba ma lus pa ni chags par 'gyur //
T02TD2301E:229b-7: dri ma med par chu ni skams 'gyur te //
T02TD2301E:229b-8: dus kyi me ni rab tu zhugs gyur pa //
T02TD2301E:229b-9: sa 'dzin 'di ni shin tu bzung dka' ste //
T02TD2301E:229b-10: mnyam dang mi mnyam dag la rgal mi nus //
T02TD2301E:229b-11: nag po na re mtshon dka' rtogs dka' ba //
T02TD2301E:229b-12: 'di ni gang gi sems kyis bsam mi nus //
T02TD2301E:229b-13: gang gi yi ni rin chen ris nus pa //
T02TD2301E:229b-14: nyi ma re re lhan cig skyes pa 'phro //
T02TD2301E:229b-15: de yis chos kyi rang bzhin dag ni shes //
T02TD2301E:229b-16: gzhan la bstan du zin kyang mi shes so //
T02TD2301E:229b-17: lam 'gro gnyug ma'i yid ni bcings nus pa //
T02TD2301E:229b-18: khams gsum ma lus spro zhing yang der sdud //
T02TD2301E:229b-19: bde gshegs srid pa'i lha mo khro bo'i tshogs //
T02TD2301E:229b-20: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dag ni spangs nas su //
T02TD2301E:229b-21: lhan skyes skad cig la ni bdag gnas bya //
T02TD2301E:229b-22: gang gis lhan skyes mi g-yo brtan nus pa //
T02TD2301E:229b-23: gnyug ma'i yid kyis rgyal po ro mnyam 'gyur //
T02TD2301E:229b-24: de yi skad cig la ni 'grub 'gyur te //
T02TD2301E:229b-25: rgas dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa gang yang med //
T02TD2301E:229b-26: mi g-yo mi rtog skyon rnams med pa ni //
T02TD2301E:229b-27: shar nub spangs pa de ni snying po ste //
T02TD2301E:229b-28: 'di ni 'di ru mya ngan 'das par gsungs //
T02TD2301E:229b-29: des ni yid kyis nga rgyal ci yang mi byed do //
T02TD2301E:229b-30: ae wam rnam pa gang gis shes gyur pa //
T02TD2301E:229b-31: des ni ma lus lus pa med par shes //
T02TD2301E:229b-32: kye ho chos kyi za ma tog ces de la bya //
T02TD2301E:229b-33: gnyug ma'i bdag po cha lugs de yin no //
T02TD2301E:229b-34: gal te rlung dang nam mkha' sgo gnyis la //
T02TD2301E:229b-35: sgo lcags dam por gang gis 'jug nus na //
T02TD2301E:229b-36: des ni de ru mun pa nag po yis //
T02TD2301E:229b-37: nang du yid kyi mar me dag ni bya //
T02TD2301E:229b-38: rgyal ba rin chen lus kyi steng du song //
T02TD2301E:229b-39: nag po na re srid longs spyad pas thar pa 'grub //
T02TD2301E:229b-40: gang gi yid ni brtan par byas gyur na //
T02TD2301E:229b-41: de ni chos kyi yi ge'i drung na gnas //
T02TD2301E:229b-42: skad cig gis ni rlung gis 'ching bar 'gyur //
T02TD2301E:229b-43: de'i tshe yul rnams la yang re ba med //
T02TD2301E:230a-2: chos kyi yi ge'i dbus su shes par gyis //
T02TD2301E:230a-3: 'di lta'i gdams ngag gsal por 'grub 'gyur ni //
T02TD2301E:230a-4: de yi khyim bdag mo rlung mi g-yo bcings //
T02TD2301E:230a-5: mchog gi ri bo'i rtse la rgyas pa'i thang //
T02TD2301E:230a-6: ri khrod pa ni de ru gnas byas pas //
T02TD2301E:230a-7: gdong lnga pas kyang rgal bar mi nus na //
T02TD2301E:230a-8: glang po che yi re ba ring du 'gyur //
T02TD2301E:230a-9: 'di ni mchog gi ri bor bdag gis bstan //
T02TD2301E:230a-10: 'di ni bde ba chen po'i gnas yin no //
T02TD2301E:230a-11: lhan cig skyes pa'i skad cig 'di ru ltos //
T02TD2301E:230a-12: bde ba chen po ma rnyed bar du'o //
T02TD2301E:230a-13: 'gro ba kun gyis lus ngag yid 'dren spyod //
T02TD2301E:230a-14: kye ho de nyid bde chen rgyal po gcig tu nyid //
T02TD2301E:230a-15: rgyud dang sngags rnams kyis ni ci zhig bya //
T02TD2301E:230a-16: gnyug ma'i khyim bdag mo ni blangs nas rol par bya //
T02TD2301E:230a-17: gnyug ma'i khyim du khyim bdag mo ni ma chud pa'i //
T02TD2301E:230a-18: bar du de srid 'dod yon lnga la spyod //
T02TD2301E:230a-19: bzlas pa sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor las 'di yis //
T02TD2301E:230a-20: rtag tu ku re rtsed mos ci zhig bya //
T02TD2301E:230a-21: gzhon nu ma dang rtag tu mdza' pa de med na /
T02TD2301E:230a-22: lus 'di yis ni byang chub ji ltar 'grub //
T02TD2301E:230a-23: gang gi rgyun du lhan cig skyes rtogs na //
T02TD2301E:230a-24: rig byed rnying pa de yis ci zhig bya //
T02TD2301E:230a-25: des ni 'gro ba ma lus rnam rtog bcad //
T02TD2301E:230a-26: gang gis yid ni rin chen brtan nus na /
T02TD2301E:230a-27: gnyug ma'i khyim bdag mo ni blangs nas 'dir //
T02TD2301E:230a-28: de ni rdo rje sems dpa' mgon po ste //
T02TD2301E:230a-29: mchog gi don 'di bdag gis rab tu brjod //
T02TD2301E:230a-30: ji ltar lan tshva chu la zhu ba bzhin //
T02TD2301E:230a-31: de ltar khyim thab mos ni gzung ba'i sems //
T02TD2301E:230a-32: kye ho skad cig gis ni ro mnyam 'gyur //
T02TD2301E:230a-33: gang gis de dang rtag tu mnyam par gnas //
T02TD2301E:230a-34: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po slob dpon nag po rdo rjes mdzad pa'i do ha mdzod ces bya ba rdzogs so /
T02TD2301E:230a-36: // / lho phyogs ko sa lar sku 'khrungs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug shr'i bee ro tsa na badzra'i zhal snga nas rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
